remarks: Transfer existential uniqueness from a variable ` x ` to another variable ` y ` contained in expression ` A ` .  Cf. ~ reuxfr2d (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Apr-2017.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Oct-2017.)
statement:
reuxfr3d.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ y e. C ) -> A e. B ) $.
reuxfr3d.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> E* y e. C x = A ) $.
reuxfr3d $p |- ( ph -> ( E! x e. B E. y e. C ( x = A /\ ps ) <-> E! y e. C ps ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d ph x y $.
$d ps x $.
